item.description:
Be sure to forward this announcement around to others you think may be interested.
Follow us on Twitter - mv911truth


This month in Nashua:

Dr Steven Jones speaks out back in February of 2006, year 5 of 911 Truth when things really start popping! 911 Revisited: Scientific and Ethical Questions at Utah Valley State College was an early, clear and very complete review of all the questions of the time, and started the speculation about thermite as the cause of the weakening of the structure in the towers.


We'll round out the evening with some new findings in the video evidence by David Chandler, a tireless independent researcher who works with Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth. We've come a long way, baby! Since the video evidence is one of the only types of evidence remaining, scrutiny of it with a fine-toothed comb becomes one of the primary ways to determine that 9/11 was, in fact, an Inside Job!
See: Cutter Charges in the North Tower of the World Trade Center, by David Chandler.

These videos should be useful for showing to newbies.

Bring your blank DVDs to the meeting and be sure to get a copy of whatever we see!


Short subjects - bring what you think others should see - we'll see what shorts we have time to view. We also have the capability to show You Tube and Google videos, so bring your links.


We have screenings every Tuesday somewhere in the Merrimack Valley: 1st Tuesday-Nashua; 2nd Tuesday-Manchester; 3rd Tuesday-Concord; 4th Tuesday- OPEN (we're looking for an organizer for a northern Merrimack Valley meeting).


Please arrive at or before 7:00 PM, since this meeting is on a tight schedule. We'll start a brief business meeting at 7 and the video will begin promptly at 7:30.


Please bring healthy snacks and/or drinks for sharing, since some may have come to our meeting directly from work.

Contributing a box of your favorite tea is always a good idea to build an inventory of available beverages!


Parking is in the lot right in front of the building and Balanced Health is the last office bay on the right. You'll see the Sunset Restaurant at the far left end.


Newspaper - For an interesting paper which covers 9/11 Truth issues and other topics of concern, visit the Rock Creek Free Press out of Washington, D.C. and see our meetup page for others.


Bring your friends! - Forward our email announcements to others you think will be interested in this important topic.


Write to us at MerrimackValley911Truth@gmail.com with your suggestions for the next month. Here's our present inventory of videos.


We have a Facebook group now called: Merrimack Valley 911 Truth - search for us and join the group!


We're on Twitter as mv911truth, so start following us and get our tweets to update you on things in our area.


See you at the movies!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be making tea and munching snacks
item.name: Nashua - 911 Revisited: Scientific and Ethical Questions by Steven Jones
